name: SOLITAIRE BATTLE ROYAL
description:
Equipped with battle mode!

Two-player battle mode compete for clear speed!

Of course, you can play it carefully by yourself.

Beginners are enjoyable too!

There is also a mode that you can play easily !

The tasks are 3000 questions!

It is only a matter that can be cleared if it is done in the correct procedure.

Collect the "collection" by clears to color the game screen!

The game screen decorated with "collection" can also be used on the competition screen.

Joy-Con controller or touch screen! Play with your favorite style!
